sentences.en: Chantelle's assertiveness stirred up his deep-seated sense of inadequacy.
sentences.cn: 仙黛尔的坚定自信激起了他根深蒂固的自卑感。

sentences.en: But the real foundation of their new assertiveness is economic.
sentences.cn: 但它们新生自信的真正基础来自经济。

sentences.en: Previous episodes of Turkish assertiveness in the region have been less welcome.
sentences.cn: 土耳其先前虽在该区扮演决定性的角色，但却一直不受欢迎。
